Medium: Supplementary materials for deluxe edition of exhibition catalogue: 4 lithographs, printed in various colors; 1 etching and drypoint, printed in black; 9 "missives" by Robert Benayoun, Micheline Bounoure, Alain Joubert, Joyce Mansour, Mimi Parent, Octavio Paz, André Pieyre de Mandiargues and XXX (1 ink blot; 7 texts; and 1 black nylon stocking); 1 telegram from Marcel Duchamp; 1 phonograph record by Joyce Mansour and Benjamin Péret; and 6 postcards of works in exhibition
Artist: Various Artists, Mimi Parent, Joan Miró, Max Walter Svanberg, Adrien Dax, Maréchal
Title: BOÎTE ALERTE, Missives Lascives from EXPOSITION INTERNATIONALE DU SURRÉALISME
